Name: kfi-fhir-input

docs.title: Classes
docs.text: Class Description Any This is a placeholder for the experimental linkml:any behavior for unions AssociatedParty Sponsors, collaborators, and other parties affiliated with a research study HasExternalId Has an external ID Institution Institution related to study or research personnel Practitioner For our purposes, this will be an investigator Record One row / entity within the database Period Time period associated with some FHIR resource PractitionerRole PractitionerRole covers the recording of the location and types of services t...

docs.title: Slots
docs.text: Slot Description classifier Research Study Party Organization Type (what type of institution is party) description Note relating to who this person is in relation to the study email An email address to reach the entity end End attribute for a FHIR period data type external_id Other identifiers for this entity, eg, from the submitting study or in system... id Global ID for this record institution_id The institution this record is associated with name Name of the entity party Individual or organization associated with study period_id Reference to a time period which defines a Start and End datatime period practitioner_id The Global ID for the PractitionerRole that links a Practitioner to their Ins... practitioner_role_id Global ID for this record role Research Study Party Role start Start attribute for a FHIR period data type title The title of the Investigator, eg, "Assistant Professor"

docs.title: Enumerations
docs.text: Enumeration Description EnumResearchStudyPartyOrganizationType Research Study Party Organization Type EnumResearchStudyPartyRole This is a ResearchStudy's party role

docs.text: Type Description Boolean A binary (true or false) value Curie a compact URI Date a date (year, month and day) in an idealized calendar DateOrDatetime Either a date or a datetime Datetime The combination of a date and time Decimal A real number with arbitrary precision that conforms to the xsd:decimal speci... Double A real number that conforms to the xsd:double specification Float A real number that conforms to the xsd:float specification Integer An integer Jsonpath A string encoding a JSON Path Jsonpointer A string encoding a JSON Pointer Ncname Prefix part of CURIE Nodeidentifier A URI, CURIE or BNODE that represents a node in a model Objectidentifier A URI or CURIE that represents an object in the model Sparqlpath A string encoding a SPARQL Property Path String A character string Time A time object represents a (local) time of day, independent of any particular... Uri a complete URI Uriorcurie a URI or a CURIE

docs.title: Class: Associated Party (AssociatedParty)
docs.text:
Sponsors, collaborators, and other parties affiliated with a research study.

URI: kfi_fhir_sparks:AssociatedParty

 classDiagram
    class AssociatedParty
    click AssociatedParty href "../AssociatedParty/"
      AssociatedParty : classifier





        AssociatedParty --> "*" EnumResearchStudyPartyOrganizationType : classifier
        click EnumResearchStudyPartyOrganizationType href "../EnumResearchStudyPartyOrganizationType/"



      AssociatedParty : name

      AssociatedParty : party





        AssociatedParty --> "0..1" Any : party
        click Any href "../Any/"



      AssociatedParty : period_id





        AssociatedParty --> "*" Period : period_id
        click Period href "../Period/"



      AssociatedParty : role





        AssociatedParty --> "0..1" EnumResearchStudyPartyRole : role
        click EnumResearchStudyPartyRole href "../EnumResearchStudyPartyRole/"

docs.title: Slots
docs.text: Name Cardinality and Range Description Inheritance name 0..1  String Name of the entity direct role 0..1  EnumResearchStudyPartyRole Research Study Party Role direct period_id *  Period Reference to a time period which defines a Start and End datatime period direct classifier *  EnumResearchStudyPartyOrganizationType Research Study Party Organization Type (what type of institution is party) direct party 0..1  Any or Practitioner or Institution Individual or organization associated with study direct

    - range: Practitioner
    - range: Institution

docs.title: Type: Jsonpath
docs.text:
A string encoding a JSON Path. The value of the string MUST conform to JSON Point syntax and SHOULD dereference to zero or more valid objects within the current instance document when encoded in tree form.

docs.title: Class: Period (Period)
docs.text:
Time period associated with some FHIR resource

URI: kfi_fhir_sparks:Period

 classDiagram
    class Period
    click Period href "../Period/"
      Period : end

      Period : period_id

      Period : start

docs.title: Slots
docs.text: Name Cardinality and Range Description Inheritance period_id 1  String Database ID for this record direct start 0..1  Datetime Start attribute for a FHIR period data type direct end 0..1  Datetime End attribute for a FHIR period data type direct

docs.title: Usages
docs.text: used by used in type used AssociatedParty period_id range Period PractitionerRole period_id range Period

docs.title: Direct
docs.text:
name: Period
description: Time period associated with some FHIR resource
title: Period
from_schema: https://carrollaboratory.github.io/kif-fhir-input
attributes:
  period_id:
    name: period_id
    description: Database ID for this record. This is not a global ID, is a global
      identifier
    title: Period ID
    from_schema: https://carrollaboratory.github.io/kfi-fhir-input/period
    identifier: true
    domain_of:
    - AssociatedParty
    - Period
    - PractitionerRole
    range: string
    required: true
  start:
    name: start
    description: Start attribute for a FHIR period data type.
    title: Start
    from_schema: https://carrollaboratory.github.io/kfi-fhir-input/period
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Period
    range: datetime
    required: false
  end:
    name: end
    description: End attribute for a FHIR period data type.
    title: End
    from_schema: https://carrollaboratory.github.io/kfi-fhir-input/period
    rank: 1000
    domain_of:
    - Period
    range: datetime
    required: false

docs.title: Class: Practitioner Role (PractitionerRole)

docs.title: ER Diagram
docs.text:
erDiagram
Any {

}
AssociatedParty {
    string name  
    EnumResearchStudyPartyRole role  
    EnumResearchStudyPartyOrganizationTypeList classifier  
}
HasExternalId {
    uriorcurieList external_id  
}
Institution {
    string name  
    string institution_id  
    uriorcurieList external_id  
}
Period {
    string period_id  
    datetime start  
    datetime end  
}
Practitioner {
    string name  
    string email  
    string description  
    string title  
    string practitioner_id  
    uriorcurieList external_id  
}
PractitionerRole {
    string practitioner_id  
    string practitioner_role_id  
}
Record {
    string id  
    uriorcurieList external_id  
}

AssociatedParty ||--|o Any : "party"
AssociatedParty ||--}o Period : "period_id"
Practitioner ||--|o Institution : "institution_id"
Practitioner ||--|o PractitionerRole : "practitioner_role_id"
PractitionerRole ||--|o Institution : "institution_id"
PractitionerRole ||--|o Period : "period_id"

docs.title: Slot: Practitioner ID (practitioner_id)
docs.text:
The Global ID for the PractitionerRole that links a Practitioner to their Institution.

URI: kfi_fhir_sparks:practitioner_id Alias: practitioner_id

docs.title: Applicable Classes
docs.text: Name Description Modifies Slot PractitionerRole PractitionerRole covers the recording of the location and types of services t... no Practitioner For our purposes, this will be an investigator no
